thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Bananaman
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Bananaman

author: Bananaman
title: Bananaman
text: Purchased a new handset from E-Global Digital Cameras at a great price and it was delivered promptly. After six months there was a hardware issue with the phone so I have tried to get it fixed through their RMA process. It has been more than six weeks since it was confirmed received by them and they are unable to give me an update as to what is going on. In retrospect I should have just paid the extra money and purchased the handset directly. Wouldn't buy anything from them again.
